trans-unit.source: Send x-plat notifications to a specific user with Windows Store client
trans-unit.target: Send x-plat notifications to a specific user with Windows Store client

trans-unit.source: Learn how to send push notifications to all devices of a specific user.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to send push notifications to all devices of a specific user.

trans-unit.source: Send cross-platform notifications to a specific user
trans-unit.target: Send cross-platform notifications to a specific user

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to send notifications to all registered devices of a specific user from your mobile backend.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to send notifications to all registered devices of a specific user from your mobile backend.

trans-unit.source: It introduced the concept of [templates], which gives client applications the freedom of specifying payload formats and variable placeholders at registration.
trans-unit.target: It introduced the concept of [templates], which gives client applications the freedom of specifying payload formats and variable placeholders at registration.

trans-unit.source: Send then hits every platform with these placeholders, enabling cross-platform notifications.
trans-unit.target: Send then hits every platform with these placeholders, enabling cross-platform notifications.

trans-unit.source: To get push working with cross-platform clients, you will need to complete this tutorial for each platform you would like to enable.
trans-unit.target: To get push working with cross-platform clients, you will need to complete this tutorial for each platform you would like to enable.

trans-unit.source: You will only need to do the <link><linkText>mobile backend update</linkText><title></title></link> once for clients that share the same mobile backend.
trans-unit.target: You will only need to do the <link><linkText>mobile backend update</linkText><title></title></link> once for clients that share the same mobile backend.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these App Service tutorials for each client platform you want working:
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these App Service tutorials for each client platform you want working:

trans-unit.source: [Get started with authentication]<html></html>Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.
trans-unit.target: [Get started with authentication]<html></html>Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.

trans-unit.source: [Get started with push notifications]<html></html>Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications.
trans-unit.target: [Get started with push notifications]<html></html>Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Update your client to register for templates to handle cross-platform pushes
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Update your client to register for templates to handle cross-platform pushes

trans-unit.source: We will instead perform InitNotificationAsync in MainPage.cs to work with user authentication.
trans-unit.target: We will instead perform InitNotificationAsync in MainPage.cs to work with user authentication.

trans-unit.target: Delete your InitNotificationAsync method definition and call in App.xmal.cs, and add the following in MainPage.cs in the MainPage class:

trans-unit.source: You will also want to transfer some using statements to MainPage.cs.
trans-unit.target: You will also want to transfer some using statements to MainPage.cs.

trans-unit.source: Use this method right after the AuthenticateAsync call in ButtonLogin_Click.
trans-unit.target: Use this method right after the AuthenticateAsync call in ButtonLogin_Click.

trans-unit.source: Your app is now set up to register user device with the user login information.
trans-unit.target: Your app is now set up to register user device with the user login information.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Test the app
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Test the app

trans-unit.source: Re-publish your mobile backend project and run any of the client apps you have set up.
trans-unit.target: Re-publish your mobile backend project and run any of the client apps you have set up.

trans-unit.source: On item insertion, the backend will send notifications to all client apps where the user is logged in.
trans-unit.target: On item insertion, the backend will send notifications to all client apps where the user is logged in.
